name: Galaxy Bumper
description:
Something's cracking around the galaxy, a Frying Saucer is ready to hatch! Bounce your way into the fray of asteroids and give a little bump to the Great Space Egg to win in our little puzzle game made for the Azure Lux Jam 2021 that's just out of this world!

Created by Instafluff and Maaya

How to Play: Use your mouse to aim and shoot a rocket

Extra Controls: R - Retry Level, A - Level Skip, Esc - Return to Menu

Note: The Twitch login functionality only works when played directly from our website at https://www.pixelplush.dev/galaxybumper/
